text: Advice for the aftermath of the war in #Syria from Murina: "Do not divide the country into enclaves after the war." #BosnianWomensDay
label: D

text: .@EliKuna: "Ask our politicians to agree to deals that include long-term goals, and we must work with locals." #BosnianWomensDay
label: D

text: .@EliKuna: "Politicians will always use nationalist rhetoric when trying to get elected, but education is key for reconciliation."
label: D

text: .@EliKuna: "Our children are learning three different versions of history, and that focus in education in #bosnia is what we need most."
label: D

text: .@EliKuna: "I do not think that we yet have embarked on reconciliation...what we do need is education."
label: D
